amendment.description: Amendment allows collaboration between and among community colleges, universities, and Manufacturing Extension Partnership Centers as an additional use for the Computer and Network Security Capacity Building Grants under the Cyber Security Research and Development Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 111-410 to allow collaboration between and among community colleges, universities, and Manufacturing Extension Partnership Centers as an additional use for the Computer and Network Security Capacity Building Grants under the Cyber Security Research and Development Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dahlkemper amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 419 - 3 (Roll no. 36).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mrs. Dahlkemper.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Dahlkemper amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 419 - 3 (Roll no. 36).
